content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help you schedule an electrical service appointment. May I please have your name?
Thanks, Mike. Could you please provide the address where you need the electrical service?
Thank you. Let me check if your address is within our service area.
I’m sorry Mike, but it looks like your address is outside our service area. Unfortunately, we won’t be able to provide service there. Is there another address you’d like us to check?
No, that’s the only address. I really need help, but I guess it’s not meant to be. Thanks anyway.
reason: Out of service area, customer declined to reschedule
